title: Vehicle registration records for license plate 43440U from 1980 until 1983

communications.subject: Pennsylvania Right to Know Act Request: Vehicle registration records for license plate 43440U from 1980 until 1983
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act, I hereby request the following records:

Vehicle registration records from January 1, 1980 until January 1, 1983, for tag number: 43440U

I need the records of the vehicle with license plate 43440U in Pennsylvania because I need to establish to whom the vehicle was registered throughout the year of 1982. Such records should include the vehicle description, the name(s) of the owner(s) of the vehicle, the registration plate number, and any addresses associated with the owner(s) of the vehicle.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Marc Howard
